mapper.select: SELECT ur.id, ur.userId, ur.roleId, ur.createTime, ur.updateTime, ar.NAME roleName, ar.CODE roleCode FROM t_user_role ur right JOIN t_auth_role ar ON ur.roleId = ar.id WHERE ur.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_role(userId, roleId, createTime) values (#{userId}, #{roleId}, #{createTime})
